workflow.name: Ai blog generator for Shopify products using Google Gemini and Google Sheets
workflow.description:
This AI Blog Generator is an advanced n8n-powered automation workflow that leverages Google Gemini and Google Sheets to generate SEO-friendly blog articles for Shopify products. It automates the entire process ‚Äî from fetching product data to creating structured HTML content ‚Äî with zero manual effort.

## üí° Key Advantages

Our AI Blog Generator offers five core advantages that make it the perfect solution for automated content creation:

- **üîó Shopify Product Sync** ‚Äî Automatically pulls product data (titles, descriptions, images, etc.) via Shopify API.
- **‚úçÔ∏è SEO Blog Generation** ‚Äî Gemini generates blog titles, meta descriptions, and complete articles using product information.
- **üóÇÔ∏è Structured Content Output** ‚Äî Creates well-formatted HTML with headers and bullet points for seamless Shopify blog integration.
- **üìÑ Google Sheets Integration** ‚Äî Tracks blog creation and prevents duplicate publishing using a centralized Google Sheet.
- **üì§ Shopify Blog API Integration** ‚Äî Publishes the generated blog to Shopify with a single API call.

## ‚öôÔ∏è How It Works

The workflow follows a systematic 8-step process that ensures quality and efficiency:

### Step-by-Step Process

1. **Manual Trigger** ‚Äì Start the workflow via a test trigger or scheduler.
2. **Fetch Products from Shopify** ‚Äì Retrieves all product details, including images and descriptions.
3. **Fix Input Format** ‚Äì Organizes and updates the input table using Code and Google Sheet nodes.
4. **Filter Duplicates** ‚Äì Ensures no previously used rows are processed again.
5. **Limit Control** ‚Äì Processes one row at a time and loops until all blogs are posted.
6. **Gemini AI Generation** ‚Äì Creates SEO-friendly blog content in HTML format from product data.
7. **HTML Structure Fix** ‚Äì Adjusts content for JSON compatibility by cleaning unsupported HTML tags.
8. **Article API Posting** ‚Äì Sends finalized blog content to Shopify for publishing or drafting.

## üõ†Ô∏è Setup Steps

### Required Node Configuration

To implement this workflow, you'll need to configure the following n8n nodes:

- **Trigger Node:** Start the workflow instantly.
- **Shopify Node:** Fetch product details.
- **Google Sheet Node:** Store input/output data and track blog creation status.
- **Code Node:** Format data as required.
- **Filter Node:** Remove used rows to avoid duplication.
- **Limit Node:** Process one blog at a time.
- **Agent Node:** Sends prompt to Gemini and returns parsed SEO-ready content.
- **HTTP Node:** Posts content to Shopify via the API.

## üîê Credentials Required

### Authentication Setup

Before running the workflow, ensure you have the following credentials configured:

- **Shopify Access Token** ‚Äì For fetching products and posting blogs
- **Gemini API Key** ‚Äì For AI-powered blog generation
- **Google Sheets OAuth** ‚Äì For logging and tracking workflow data

## üë§ Ideal For

### Target Users

This automation workflow is specifically designed for:

- **Ecommerce teams** automating blogs for hundreds of products
- **Shopify store owners** boosting organic traffic effortlessly
- **Marketing teams** building scalable, AI-driven content workflows

## üí¨ Bonus Tip

### Extensibility Features

The workflow is fully modular and highly customizable. You can easily extend it for:

- **Internal linking** between related products
- **Multi-language translation** for global markets
- **Social media sharing** automation
- **Email marketing** integration

All extensions can be implemented within the same n8n flow, making it a comprehensive content automation solution.
---

parameters.content:
# Shopify Product-to-Blog Automation with AI & Google Sheets
## This workflow automates the process of turning Shopify product data into SEO-optimized blog posts. It:

- Fetches product details from Shopify.
- Cleans and formats descriptions & images.
- Stores raw and refined data in Google Sheets.
- Uses an AI agent (Google Gemini) to generate blog 
  content (title, intro, features, reviews, SEO fields).
- Publishes the blog post to the Shopify Blog automatically.
- Updates Google Sheets with blog status and article ID for tracking.

## It‚Äôs a hands-free system for content marketing:
### Where every new product can become a polished, SEO-ready blog post 
### without manual writing.

options.systemMessage:
=You are an expert content writer who creates concise, high-converting product blog posts for Shopify stores. Your output must follow this exact structure, using HTML tags for formatting, and adhering to ideal word/character counts for readability and engagement. Write a blog post using the following structure: 1. **Title** (within

tags) - Make it catchy and relevant to the product title, approximately 8‚Äì12 words and 50‚Äì70 characters. 2. **Introduction** (within

tags) - Write 40‚Äì60 words (250‚Äì350 characters) that hook the reader by highlighting a relatable problem, followed by a quick product benefit summary. 3. **Key Features** (within

    and
  • tags) - List the top 4‚Äì6 features in short, scannable bullet points totaling 50‚Äì100 words (300‚Äì600 characters). 4. **Customer Reviews / Experience** (within
    or
    tags) - Include 2‚Äì3 short, authentic-sounding customer testimonials or experiences, total 80‚Äì120 words (450‚Äì700 characters). 5. **Use Case Callout** (within

    tags, optionally with ) - Briefly define who the product is ideal for, in 40‚Äì60 words (250‚Äì350 characters). 6. **Call to Action** (within

    tags) - Close with a clear invitation to buy or learn more, about 20‚Äì40 words (120‚Äì250 characters). Additionally, at the end of the output provide: - An excerpt summary (max 160 characters) without tags - A page title suitable for SEO (under 60 characters) - A meta description (140‚Äì160 characters) summarizing the blog content for search engines --- Output the content with proper HTML markup and all requested fields exactly like this JSON: { \"blog_title\": \"[Your formatted

    title here without tags]\", \"content\": \"[Full HTML content as a string with tags as per the structure above]\", \"excerpt\": \"[SEO-friendly excerpt summary]\", \"page_title\": \"[SEO page title]\", \"meta_description\": \"[SEO meta description]\" } Write the response ONLY as this JSON object without any additional commentary or text.

parameters.content:
# User Instruction for Workflow

## Setup Credentials
- Connect your Shopify store (Admin API Access Token).
- Connect your Google Sheets account (with access to the provided spreadsheet).
- Ensure Google Gemini API key is added for AI blog generation.

## Configure Spreadsheet
- The workflow writes to three sheets:
- Raw Input ‚Üí Stores Shopify product data.
- Refined Input ‚Üí Stores cleaned description, plain text, and images.
- Blog Post ‚Üí Stores AI-generated blog drafts and publishing status.

## Execution
- Start the workflow using the Manual Trigger or schedule it with a Cron Trigger.
- The workflow will fetch all Shopify products, generate blog content, and post articles automatically.

## Monitoring
- Check Google Sheets to track product ‚Üí blog mapping.
- Column blog_status will show:
- unused ‚Üí Product not yet blogged.
- generated ‚Üí Blog draft created but not yet posted.
- posted ‚Üí Blog published successfully.
- Customization

### Update AI prompt in the AI Agent Node if you want different blog styles.
### Change Shopify blog ID or tags inside the HTTP Request Node if you want posts to go to a different blog category.

# Author Details

![Manish Kumar](https://scontent.fixr3-4.fna.fbcdn.net/v/t1.6435-9/123542841_3445643652217456_8290902936669467422_n.jpg?_nc_cat=106&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6ee11a&_nc_ohc=NyTSSbh_JUQQ7kNvwGv2E33&_nc_oc=AdnSbeTxdN-An4wFvKbNoPe9jVwC1m6krNn5rzMrUfOs7tIH8UvqXGhPjaB79gdwiAfhI4jyYNLhFEffKAXHmKPg&_nc_zt=23&_nc_ht=scontent.fixr3-4.fna&_nc_gid=_mUXMYwqF04yK6N-XfUOHw&oh=00_AfbyxGux-ay7V2wOe08boD99Nz6M7Q2D7cwOodouEhWHMA&oe=68EE0148)

## Manish Kumar
### Expert Designer & Automation Engineer for Custom Shopify Apps

I specialize in designing seamless customer experiences and automating workflows for Shopify, web, and business platforms. From custom apps integration to process optimization, my solutions empower teams to work smarter and scale faster.

## Contact:

output.content:
Breathe Easy Anywhere: Discover AuraWave Portable Air Purifier

Is stale, allergen-filled air making you uncomfortable? Whether at home, the office, or traveling, poor air quality can impact your well-being. Introducing the AuraWave Portable Air Purifier ‚Äì your silent solution for cleaner, fresher air. This compact device uses advanced HEPA filtration to eliminate dust, allergens, and odors, ensuring you breathe better, wherever you are.

  • True HEPA Filtration: Captures 99.97% of particles as tiny as 0.3 microns, including dust, pollen, and pet dander.
  • Whisper-Quiet Operation: Enjoy undisturbed peace; perfect for bedrooms, nurseries, or quiet workspaces.
  • Cordless Convenience: USB rechargeable battery provides ultimate portability and freedom from outlets.
  • Compact & Lightweight: Easily fits into any bag or desk, making it your ideal travel companion.
  • Odor Elimination: Effectively removes unpleasant smells, leaving your space fresh and clean.
  • Allergy & Asthma Relief: Creates a safer environment for sufferers by reducing airborne triggers.

"I suffer from severe allergies, and the AuraWave has been a game-changer! I keep it on my nightstand, and I've noticed a significant reduction in my morning congestion. Plus, it's so quiet I barely know it's there." ‚Äì Sarah L.

"Working in a small office, the air often feels stuffy. Since getting the AuraWave, my concentration has improved, and I feel much more energized. It's incredibly discreet and powerful for its size." ‚Äì Mark T.

"We took our AuraWave on our last road trip, and it made such a difference in hotel rooms. It's small enough not to be a hassle and ensures we always have clean air, no matter where we are." ‚Äì Jessica R.

Who is the AuraWave for? This portable air purifier is perfect for anyone seeking to improve their personal air quality. It's an essential for allergy and asthma sufferers, remote workers, students in dorms, frequent travelers, or simply anyone who desires a fresh, clean breathing space, anytime, anywhere.

Ready to experience the difference clean air makes? Elevate your environment and breathe easier with the AuraWave Portable Air Purifier. Click here to shop now and start your journey to a healthier, fresher you!
output.excerpt: Breathe cleaner, fresher air anywhere with AuraWave, the silent and compact portable air purifier. Removes dust, allergens, and odors with HEPA filtration.
output.blog_title: Breathe Easy Anywhere: Discover AuraWave Portable Air Purifier
output.page_title: AuraWave Portable Air Purifier - Clean Air Anywhere
output.meta_description: Discover AuraWave, the compact & silent portable air purifier. Features HEPA filtration for dust, allergens, and odor removal. Breathe fresh air at home, office, or travel.

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
